briefTitle: Lifestyle Behavioural Intervention on Breast Cancer Survivors for the Treatment of Overweight/Obesity.
officialTitle: Design, Implementation and Evaluation of a Behavioural Intervention to Treat Obesity in Breast Cancer Survivors.
conditions: Breast Cancer Female, Overweight and Obesity
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* BMI between 25 and 40 kg/m2

Exclusion Criteria:

* active cancer or any ongoing treatment except hormonal or immune therapy
